name: Meal Prep Salmon Dish
author: Adam Thomas
summary: Twp different flavors of salmon, enough for 4 meals.
ingredients: 5 ounces green beans, trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces
5 ounces asparagus, trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces
2 tablespoons olive oil, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Mix soy sauce, balsamic vinaigrette, 1/4 cup olive oil, and minced garlic in a shallow bowl
Add 2 salmon pieces to the bowl
Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Mix paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper together in a bowl
Spread green beans, asparagus, and carrot on a rimmed baking sheet
Drizzle with 2 tablespoons olive oil and season with salt and pepper
Nestle salmon pieces between vegetables on the baking sheet
Roast in the preheated oven until salmon flakes easily with a fork and vegetables are tender, about 11 minutes
